issues.title: Split Get Energy Switch Status endpoint / Add a Get Energy Switch Agreement endpoint?
issues.author: wcai-biza
issues.body: Currently, Get Energy Switch Status does not tell ADR how the account switch is going after authorize code is claimed. We need another endpoint that ADR can poll to know if the account switching completes successfully or fails.

issues.title: urn:dio:action_id claim in the non-normative example of a decoded request object should be a JSON object
